QuestData.Title: Mission: The Hozen Dozen
QuestData.Description: I've been watching the hozen since I arrived, and I don't like the pattern of activity that I'm seeing in their camp.$B$BMultiple hozen travel down the mountain under the cover of night, pillaging supplies from the farmlands below.$B$BWe must stop their rampant theft. I have been thinning their numbers when I can, but one soldier alone is not enough.$B$BI need your help. Kill as many of the hozen as you can.
